There is a JAV based on this manga and it's actually pretty good as far as adaptations go. MUDR-035 if someone is curious. As to the content itself, I like the art and the story is basically the same as always. However, main chick never mind breaks or becomes a cumdump so things are played completely straight all the way to the end which is very rare these days. Great stuff.
